DOC.brief_summary: This is an investigation of the efficacy and safety of CRD007 in Duchenne Muscular Dystrophy (DMD), Becker Muscular Dystrophy (BMD) and symptomatic carriers.
DOC.brief_title: CRD007 for the Treatment of Duchenne Muscular Dystrophy, Becker Muscular Dystrophy and Symptomatic Carriers
DOC.criteria: Documented diagnosis of dystrophinopathy Severe functional impairment
